name: XssMatchSet
shortDesc: The AWS::WAF::XssMatchSet resource specifies the parts of web requests that you want AWS WAF to inspect for cross-site scripting attacks and the name of the header to inspect. For more information, see XssMatchSet in the AWS WAF API Reference.

properties.name: Name
properties.desc: A friendly name or description for the XssMatchSet.

properties.name: XssMatchTuples
properties.desc: The parts of web requests that you want to inspect for cross-site scripting attacks.
properties.type: List of AWS WAF XssMatchSet XssMatchTuple
